Contents.Content: select br.病人编号 as PatientID, br.病人姓名 as PatientName, br.性别 as PatientSex, br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, br.年龄 as PatientAge, br.身份证号 as PatientIDCard, br.社保卡号 as PatientMcard, br.地址 as PatientAddress, br.联系电话 as PatientTel, br.高危 as IsHighRiskInfectivity, zy.住院号 as InPatientCode, zy.病区 as DeptName, zy.床位 as BedNumber, zy.床位护士 as BedNurse from NEUHIS.SHGX_住院病人基本信息 br left join NEUHIS.SHGX_住院信息 zy on br.病人编号=zy.住院号 where 1=1 {0}

select ss.PAT_VID, ss.OPERATING_ROOM, ks.DEPT_NAME, ss.OPERATION_DATE, --手术时间 ss.SURGEON, --医生 ss.DIAG_BEFORE_OPERATION, --手术名称 ss.START_DATE_TIME, --手术开始时间 ss.END_DATE_TIME --手术结束时间 from infecon_operation ss left join infecon_deptinfo ks on ss.DEPT_NAME=ks.DEPT_CODE where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 br.病人编号 as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.病人姓名 as NAME, --病人姓名 br.病人姓名 as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.病区 as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.床位 as BEDNO --床位 from NEUHIS.SHGX_住院病人基本信息 br left join NEUHIS.SHGX_住院信息 zy on br.病人编号=zy.住院号 where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.patient_id as VALUE,--病人编号 br.name as NAME, --病人姓名 br.name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.birth_date as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.op_record_ID as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.group_name as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.name as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.op_datetime as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.op_doctor as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.order_name as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from dbo.view_supply_patient_info br left join dbo.view_supply_op_info ss on br.patient_id=ss.patient_id where 1=1 {0}

/*--病人挂号信息--*/ select br.病人编号 as PatientID, br.病人姓名 as PatientName, br.性别 as PatientSex, br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, br.年龄 as PatientAge, br.身份证号 as PatientIDCard, br.社保卡号 as PatientMcard, br.地址 as PatientAddress, br.联系电话 as PatientTel, br.高危 as IsHighRiskInfectivity, gh.挂号系统编号 as xh, gh.急诊还是门诊 as ghlb, gh.挂号时间 as ghsj, gh.挂号科室 as ghks, gh.挂号号 as ghh from NEUHIS.SHGX_门诊病人基本信息 br left join NEUHIS.SHGX_挂号信息 gh on br.病人编号=gh.挂号系统编号 where 1=1 {0} order by gh.挂号时间 Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 br.病人姓名 as NAME, --病人姓名 br.病人姓名 as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.挂号系统编号 as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.急诊还是门诊 as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 gh.挂号时间 as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.挂号号 as REGISTERNUMBER --挂号序号 from NEUHIS.SHGX_门诊病人基本信息 br left join NEUHIS.SHGX_挂号信息 gh on br.病人编号=gh.挂号系统编号 where 1=1 {0} order by gh.挂号时间 Desc
/*--根据工号查询登录人员信息--*/ select name from view_supply_employee where emp_sn=@emp_sn
